comment: Number of pt bins is #ptedges - 1. Therefore #rebins = #ptedges -1

output.mass: E/p ratio for electrons; matched cluster p_{T}, GeV; E/p ratio; %s
output.width: E/p ratio width ; matched cluster p_{T}; #sigma_{E/p}; %s
output.chi2: #chi^{2} / N_{dof} for E/p ratio; p_{T}, GeV; #chi^{2} / N_{dof}; %s
output.nmesons: Number of electrons in each p_{T} bin; p_{T}, GeV; #frac{dN}{dp_{T}}; %s
output.spectrum: Number of electrons in each p_{T} bin; p_{T}, GeV; #frac{dN}{dp_{T}}; %s
